mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SECURE_DATA ( ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, TOP_LEVEL_KV_COUNT, `TYPE`, SIZE_IN_BYTES, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TS, LAST_ROTATED_TS ) VALUES ( #{record.id}, #{record.sdboxId}, #{record.path}, #{record.encryptedBlob}, #{record.topLevelKVCount}, #{record.type}, #{record.sizeInBytes}, #{record.createdBy}, #{record.createdTs}, #{record.lastUpdatedBy}, #{record.lastUpdatedTs}, #{record.lastRotatedTs} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SECURE_DATA SET ENCRYPTED_BLOB = #{record.encryptedBlob}, TOP_LEVEL_KV_COUNT = #{record.topLevelKVCount}, SIZE_IN_BYTES = #{record.sizeInBytes}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{record.lastUpdatedBy}, LAST_UPDATED_TS = #{record.lastUpdatedTs}, LAST_ROTATED_TS = #{record.lastRotatedTs} WHERE ID = #{record.id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, `TYPE`, SIZE_IN_BYTES, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TS, LAST_ROTATED_TS From SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH = #{path} AND SDBOX_ID = #{sdbId} for UPDATE
SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, `TYPE`, SIZE_IN_BYTES, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TS, LAST_ROTATED_TS From SECURE_DATA WHERE ID = #{id} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, `TYPE`, SIZE_IN_BYTES, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TS, LAST_ROTATED_TS From SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH = #{path} AND `TYPE` = #{type} AND SDBOX_ID = #{sdbId}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ID, GREATEST(LAST_UPDATED_TS, LAST_ROTATED_TS) AS LAST_ROTATED_TS, 'SECURE_DATA' AS SOURCE From SECURE_DATA UNION ALL SELECT ID, GREATEST(VERSION_CREATED_TS, LAST_ROTATED_TS) AS LAST_ROTATED_TS, 'SECURE_DATA_VERSION' AS SOURCE FROM SECURE_DATA_VERSION ) AS DATA_KEY_INFO WHERE LAST_ROTATED_TS < #{datetime} ORDER by LAST_ROTATED_TS ASC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, `TYPE`, SIZE_IN_BYTES, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TS, LAST_ROTATED_TS From SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH = #{path} AND `TYPE` = #{type} AND SDBOX_ID = #{sdbId}
SELECT PATH From SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH LIKE '${partialPath}%' AND SDBOX_ID = #{sdbId};
SELECT PATH FROM SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH LIKE '${partialPath}%' AND `TYPE` = #{type} AND SDBOX_ID = #{sdbId}

SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, `TYPE`, SIZE_IN_BYTES, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TS, LAST_ROTATED_TS FROM SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH LIKE '${partialPath}%' AND `TYPE` = #{type} AND SDBOX_ID = #{sdbId} ORDER BY CREATED_TS DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH LIKE '${partialPath}%' AND `TYPE` = #{type}
SELECT DISTINCT PATH From SECURE_DATA WHERE SDBOX_ID = #{sdbId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH LIKE '${partialPath}%' AND SDBOX_ID = #{sdbId};
DELETE FROM SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH = #{path} AND SDBOX_ID = #{sdbId}
